AboutPage.intro: Hi! I'm Seha, a product-oriented software engineer. I develop solutions that prioritize user experience and pay attention to details.

section1.text: In the software development process, I not only write code but also focus on understanding user needs and contributing to product design. Here are the areas I focus on:

list.item1: Frontend Development: Modern and performant web applications with React, Next.js, TypeScript
list.item2: User Experience: Detail-oriented, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces
list.item3: Product Thinking: Balancing technical decisions with user needs and business goals

section2.text: I love contributing to open source projects, learning new technologies, and sharing my experiences. Currently, I am:

story-craft.title: story-craft
story-craft.description: AI-powered Turkish story generator application built with modern web technologies.

tr-slugify.title: tr-slugify
tr-slugify.description: NPM package that correctly converts Turkish special characters and creates slugs for URLs.

git-score-lab.title: Git Score Lab
git-score-lab.description: A tool that helps you track your Git contributions and see your progress over time.

path-way-app.title: path-way-app
path-way-app.description: A travel planning application developed for backpackers and travel enthusiasts that works offline. You can use maps, plan your trips, and manage your routes without an internet connection.

code-context-isolation.title: RSC context isolation fix
code-context-isolation.description: Isolated server component renders with AsyncLocalStorage to prevent user metrics from mixing.

idea-playlists.title: CSS experiment playground
idea-playlists.description: Planning a micro playground where I can collect my small experiments based on Tailwind + motion on a single page.

note-learning.title: Learn by writing
note-learning.description: Publishing short notes and code snippets makes what I learn permanent. The Thoughts page is here to speed this up.
